title: A Swan Song for Mr Piddlesworth and Kades
body: Just wanted to reach out to Riot Mr. Piddlesworth and Kades. Just finished listening to the Game Design Round Table with you guys on and I'm extremely excited about this game. The thought and love put in is impressive and I cannot wait to play this as both an avid LoL fan and board game enthusiast. Here's to more board games, and stack that deck for the next pitch! ;)

replies.body:
You got me really scared there for a moment, LightningJuice.  The term Swan Song has a different meaning from what you intended, I think?

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swan_song

Haha yes, I was only intending it as a reference to the podcast. I can see what may be alarming from that!! 

Also it did get attention in the swarm of ordering posts, so thank you! :)
Boosting this, since I've been impressed at the community interaction in here from those two. Mad props.
